mention.text: ituango municipality , 195 km north of medellin
the rebels , who were members of the farc 28th front
a jeep near san juan de urama municipality near road no 32
police commander colonel jose william bermudez zapata , who commands antiguerrilla operations with the support of 7th brigade troops
the victims -- who were involved in cocaine trafficking --
the name of the person taken by the rebels
